summary: This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information related to Jeffrey Epstein and associated accounts managed by Deutsche Bank. It details account ownership, purposes, expected inflows and outflows, and relationships with other individuals and entities involved in Epstein's financial activities. This document contains Know Your Customer (KYC) information for various individuals associated with Jeffrey Epstein and his financial dealings. It includes personal details, professional backgrounds, and connections to financial institutions, highlighting their roles and relationships in the context of Epstein's financial activities. This document is a Know Your Customer (KYC) report detailing the financial and legal entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including Southern Trust Company, Inc. and Zorro Management, LLC. It outlines the ownership structures, financial activities, and risk assessments related to these entities, as well as the individuals involved in their management.
